attributes.action: Call a General Election for new Parliament & Prime Minister NOW
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron has deserted his post when his country needs him the most, The British people should not have to be kept in turmoil Until October, and should be given the chance to decide who THEY want as their new government.
attributes.background: The United Kingdom is in Crisis mode, and the Prime Minister has resigned.  The UK Needs NEW leadership NOW, to help get it through the problems and potential difficulties that pulling out of the EU May bring.
